| Column | Data                                                                          |
+--------+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| a      | Int8([1, 2, 3])                                                               |
| a2     | Nullable(NullableColumn { column: UInt8([1, 2, 3]), validity: [0b_____011] }) |
| b      | Int16([2, 4, 6])                                                              |
| c      | UInt32([10, 20, 30])                                                          |
| d      | Float64([10.0, -20.0, 30.0])                                                  |
| Output | Float64([3.0, 20.0, 3.0])                                                     |
+--------+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
